Dear Dr. Harleyt
We are pleased to inform you that your research proposal,
#279, entitled*
"Understanding Media"
has been approved by the Advisory Committee on New Educational
Media for negotiation under Public Law 85—864, subject to avail¬
ability of funds.
A member of the New Educational Media Branch staff will
write to you or call by telephone within the next ten days
concerning plans for the processing of tale grant.
Sincerely yours,
Roy M. Hall
